content.query:
CREATE PROCEDURE salesProc
AS
BEGIN

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'Sales')
BEGIN
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[Sales];
END

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'christy/',
    DATA_SOURCE = sales,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
)
AS
SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'sales/sales.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'sales',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)AS source_date
WHERE EmailAddress = 'christy12@adventure-works.com'

END
